CustomField.formula: IF(FSM_PermitEndDate__c < NOW(), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Red Flag"), IF(NOW()+ 1 >= FSM_PermitEndDate__c, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "Amber Flag"), IF(NOW()+ 1 <= FSM_PermitEndDate__c,IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif","Green Flag"), "") ) )
CustomField.label: TMA Rag Indicator
